Back to Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Sonata movement in B-flat major, KV 400/372a

c. 1781 · KV1,2 400 · KV3,6 372a

[IMSLP]

The piece is incomplete, but is best known in a completion by Maximilian Stadler.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/25/2 · BA 4601-01 · Klaviersonaten / Band 2 · ed. Wolfgang Plath / Wolfgang Rehm [with completion by Maximilian Stadler]
  • Associated Board · Mature Piano Pieces · ed. Richard Jones [with completion by Maximilian Stadler]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 4862 · Klaviersonaten / II · ed. Wolfgang Plath / Wolfgang Rehm [with completion by Maximilian Stadler]
  • Henle · HN 22 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [with completion by Maximilian Stadler]
  • Henle · HN 23 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [with completion by Maximilian Stadler]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50230 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Spätere Werke · ed. Ulrich Leisinger [with completions by Maximilian Stadler and Robert Levin]

Duration: 10'

Difficulty: 3
